description: This file defines a custom permission class 'IsOwner' for use with Django REST Framework, allowing access control based on object ownership and user authentication.

classes.name: IsOwner
classes.description: Object-level permission class that grants access only to the object's owner based on user ID, and requires authentication for all requests.

methods.name: bool has_object_permission(self, request, view, obj)
methods.description: Checks if the requesting user owns the object by comparing user IDs.

methods.name: bool has_permission(self, request, view)
methods.description: Ensures the user is authenticated before granting permission.

ctags.name: has_object_permission
ctags.pattern: /^    def has_object_permission(self, request, view, obj) -> bool:$/
